headline: UBS Reaffirms Buy on Steel Dynamics (STLD) Amid Pricing Stability
summary: Steel Dynamics Inc. (NASDAQ:STLD) ranks among the stocks to benefit from an onshoring boom. Citing stable flat steel pricing and improved long steel product pricing, UBS kept its Buy rating and $149 price target on Steel Dynamics Inc. (NASDAQ:STLD) on July 22. While long steel products continued to strengthen into July, Steel Dynamics Inc. (NASDAQ:STLD) […]
